title: Khawi lam mi nge hmanah heng hi
lyrics:
Phuahtu: Hrawva.
Doh is Aâ™­

Khawi lam mi nge, hmanah heng hi,
Tunah puan ropui nen;
Engtin nge chatuan hmun nuam hi,
An lo thlen theih ni le?

Hrehawm tinreng tuar tawh hnute,
Eng ram lo thleng an ni;
An puan eng ropui varnate,
Beramno thisenin.

Enteh, lawmna tumkau chawiin,
Van lalthutthleng hmaan;
Hmangaih Pa Pathian rawngbawlin,
Vanram ropui hmunan.

Riltam tuiihal a awm tawh lo'ng,
Ni sa tuar tawh lovin;
Pa Pathian nian a eng ang,
Chatuan hlimna engin.

Beramno lalthutthleng hmaan,
An belh Lal ropui chuan;
Van thil duh tinkim lo hlanin,
An hruaitu a ni ang.

Ram hmuun hring cham chunga lengin,
Nunna tui thiang karah;
Hmana tuarna lungchhiat mittui,
Lalpan a hru fai ang.

Pa, Fapa leh Thlarau Thianghlim,
Kan biak lai kan Pathian;
Ropuina hman angin tunan,
Chatuanin chang rawh se.
